description:
Sacrifices his existence for http://anidb.net/ch13443 [Katsumi Liqueur] in order to protect her against an attack by humans at her, as she is suspected to be one of these "Category IV http://anidb.net/ch25718 [Lucifer Hawks]" who are hated the most by the human population.
Later the scene turns out to be an illusion created by http://anidb.net/ch25712 [Ganossa Maximilian] to make Katsumi (who is in fact half-breed human/LH) side with the Lucifer Hawks.
name: Rave Savedeath
